title: President Trump is Delivering on Immigration Enforcement for the American People – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
February 28, 2017
DELIVERING ON IMMIGRATION: President Donald J. Trump has taken a series of Executive actions to combat illegal immigration. SAVING THE AMERICAN TAXPAYER: Our current immigration system unfairly penalizes the American taxpayer. President Trump will make sure they are protected.
